Body:
IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[sa_ex_mailboxaccess_allperms]', 'U') IS NOT NULL

BEGIN

  DROP TABLE [dbo].[sa_ex_mailboxaccess_allperms];

END;

 

-- Step 2: Create the new table

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[sa_ex_mailboxaccess_allperms] (

  [Email] NVARCHAR(255),

  [Trustee] NVARCHAR(255),

  [Permissions] NVARCHAR(255)

);

 

-- Step 3: Insert combined data into the new table

INSERT INTO [dbo].[sa_ex_mailboxaccess_allperms] (

  [Email],

  [Trustee],

  [Permissions]

)

SELECT 

  r.[Email],

  r.[Trustee],

  r.[Permissions]

FROM [dbo].[sa_ex_mailboxaccess_rights] r

 

UNION ALL

 

SELECT 

  s.[E-Mail] AS [Email],

  s.[Trustee],

  s.[Permission Level] AS [Permissions]

FROM [dbo].[sa_ex_mailboxaccess_sendas] s;
